Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IIa microcin
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (also closely related bacteria), Enterobacteriaceae.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Colicin V kills sensitive cells by disrupting the membrane potential. It targets bacterial membranes and induces ion channel formation, leading to the disruption of the proton-motive force and hence ATP production.

Literature.Title: Purification and characterization of colicin V from Escherichia coli culture supernatants.
Literature.Author: Fath MJ, Zhang LH, Rush J, Kolter R.
